name: Beach Sarong
description:
## Beach Sarong

Perfect for a day in the sun or a sunset stroll along the beach, our Beach Sarong is an essential addition to your beach bag.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
